name: 霍弘毅
objective:
This new course will examine the question of decision-making in business.  The course is organized around canonical texts in the Western tradition which have a bearing on custom, ethics, rationality and self-interest.  Each of these factors will be examined in turn.  The course is in four broad sections: Conventional Wisdom, Homo Œconomicus, Game Theory, and Ethics. 

本課程以英文語言及西方文學、文化思維為基礎深入分析討論現代經貿科技現象及趨勢。課程主軸以強化深入英語文閱讀及討論能力，進而探討經貿科技主題，包括，企業領導力，決策力，企業倫理，溝通協商策略，競爭與合作等。課程以全英語進行，選修本課程學生須具備中級英文以上程度。
